original: gcig min du ma ma yin bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs chen gzhir gyur pa //
analyzed: gcig min du ma ma yin bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs chen gzhir gyur pa //

original: dngos min dngos po med pa ma yin mkha' ltar ro gcig rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: dngos min dngos po med pa ma yin mkha' ltar ro gcig rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin can //

original: gos pa med cing mi 'gyur zhi la mi mnyam mnyam pa khyab pa can ste spros med pa //
analyzed: gos pa med cing mi 'gyur zhi la mi mnyam mnyam pa khyab pa can ste spros med pa //
translated: Unstained, unchanging, peaceful, equal to the unequal, pervasive, and free from conceptual elaborations,

original: so so rang rig rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dpe med gang yin de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: so so rang rig rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dpe med gang yin de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to the dharmakƒÅya of the victorious ones, which is to be realized individually, and is incomparable.

original: rang gi 'byor pa 'jig rten las 'das bsam gyis mi khyab legs mdzad brgya yi 'bras bu ni //
analyzed: rang gi 'byor pa 'jig rten las 'das bsam gyis mi khyab legs mdzad brgya yi 'bras bu ni //
translated: The result of a hundred excellent deeds, your supramundane and inconceivable wealth,

original: blo can rnams kyi dga' ba bskyed phyir 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs rgyas par ston mdzad cing //
analyzed: blo can rnams kyi dga' ba bskyed phyir 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs rgyas par ston mdzad cing //
translated: You display it in various ways within the assembly in order to generate joy in the wise.

original: rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi sgra skad rgya chen 'jig rten kun du 'phro bar mdzad pa po //
analyzed: rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi sgra skad rgya chen 'jig rten kun du 'phro bar mdzad pa po //
translated: And who always radiates the great sound of the Dharma throughout the world.

original: sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal srid gnas pa gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal srid gnas pa gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha‚Äôs enjoyment body, which is the abode of the Dharma king.

original: sems can rnams ni smin par mdzad phyir la la dag tu me 'bar bzhin du gang snang zhing //
analyzed: sems can rnams ni smin par mdzad phyir la la dag tu me 'bar bzhin du gang snang zhing //
translated: In some places, it appears as if it were a blazing fire, in order to ripen beings.

original: la lar yang ni rdzogs par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu zhi bar gang snang la //
analyzed: la lar yang ni rdzogs par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu zhi bar gang snang la //
translated: In some places, it appears as if it were perfect enlightenment, the wheel of the Dharma, and nirvana.

original: sna tshogs thabs tshul rnam pa du mar 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs sel ba //
analyzed: sna tshogs thabs tshul rnam pa du mar 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs sel ba //
translated: It engages in many different methods and ways and removes the fears of the three worlds.

original: phyogs bcur chub mdzad thub pa rnams kyi sprul sku don chen gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phyogs bcur chub mdzad thub pa rnams kyi sprul sku don chen gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the great purpose of the emanation body of the buddhas, the Capable Ones, who are enlightened in the ten directions.

original: sems can don gcig rgyun du mdzad cing bsod nams ye shes chen po dpag med las byung ba'i //
analyzed: sems can don gcig rgyun du mdzad cing bsod nams ye shes chen po dpag med las byung ba'i //
translated: It is the constant cause of the benefit of beings and arises from immeasurable great merit and wisdom.

original: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsum yid dang tshig gi lam @71a * //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsum yid dang tshig gi lam @71a * //
translated: The three bodies of the Sugatas are beyond the path of speech and thought.

original: las rab tu 'das pa la //
analyzed: las rab tu 'das pa la //
translated: And who have transcended all activity.

original: bdag gis dad pas phyag byas dge ba byang chub sa bon bsags par gyur pa gang yin des //
analyzed: bdag gis dad pas phyag byas dge ba byang chub sa bon bsags par gyur pa gang yin des //
translated: By the virtue of the faith with which I have made this praise,üîΩMay I attain the three bodies, and may all beings enter the path to enlightenment.
